  • Classes in se.citerus.dddsample.domain.model.handling used by se.citerus.dddsample.application
    Class
    Description
    CannotCreateHandlingEventException
    If a HandlingEvent can't be created from a given set of parameters.
    HandlingEvent
    A HandlingEvent is used to register the event when, for instance, a cargo is unloaded from a carrier at some location at a given time.
    HandlingEvent.Type
    Handling event type.
